ch.intertec.storybook.jasper

Interface ReportConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigLoader, ExportManager

    public interface ReportConstants
    Contains the constants required in this package. Abstracted out of the ExportManager class to be reused.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
